div.p: OF SCOTTY'S YEARS FALLS IN LOVE,
WAS SHE HURT BY THE FALL
YOU LET ME BE THE JUDGE
AND I WANT TO KNOW WHY.
I WANT TO KNOW WHY, TOO.
WELL, IF WE CAN GET ON
IT WILL HIT THE MEMORY ALPHA
I HOPE THE STORM IS AWARE
SHE'S GOING TO BE FINE NOW.
WE HAVE BEEN UNABLE TO MAKE
WHEN WE RETURN TO THE SHIP
WE FOUND ONE PERSON IN THERE
YOU'LL BE KILLED IF WE STAY.
MAYBE I CAN TALK TO IT.
I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO GATHER
SHE'S IN A PRETTY BAD STATE.
BUT THE BCP IS JUST AS
MIRA HAS TRIED TO TELL ME
THEY'VE CALLED THE TURN ON US
I WANT TO BE WITH YOU.
THAT IS ONE OF THE PLANETS
HAS ITS OWN LIFE TO LEAD.
WE DID NOT WISH TO KILL.
I WANT TO LIVE IT OUT.
Deep voice: DO NOT FIGHT US.
TRY NOT TO MOVE AT ALL.
